General.Name: Malaysian Bulk Carriers Bhd
General.Description: Malaysian Bulk Carriers Berhad, an investment holding company, provides dry bulk shipping services in Malaysia and internationally. The company transports major bulks, such as iron ore, coal, and grains; and minor bulks comprising sugar, coke, fertilisers, and other products. It also offers ship brokering and managing services; and general shipping services, as well as engages in retail business. As of December 31, 2022, the company owned and operated a fleet of 4 vessels with an approximate carrying capacity of 258 deadweight tonnage. Malaysian Bulk Carriers Berhad was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
